name: context-mode
description: Claude Code MCP plugin that saves 98% of your context window. Sandboxed code execution in 10 languages, FTS5 knowledge base with BM25 ranking, and intent-driven search.

hooks.prompt: You have mcp__context-mode__execute and mcp__context-mode__execute_file available. If this Bash command could produce more than 20 lines of output (curl, npm test, git log, cat large files, API calls, docker/kubectl commands), use mcp__context-mode__execute instead — it processes output in a sandbox and only returns a summary to context. For small commands (git status, pwd, ls, echo) Bash is fine.
